gold.user: User wants to analyze a Jira expression to understand its structure and components.
gold.ideal: The API should return a detailed analysis of the expression, including any errors or warnings.

gold.user: User needs to evaluate a specific Jira expression to get the result based on current issue data.
gold.ideal: The API should return the evaluated result of the expression, along with any relevant context.

gold.user: User is looking to evaluate a JSIS Jira expression for a custom field calculation.
gold.ideal: The API should provide the evaluation result of the JSIS expression, including any errors encountered.
